name: Bigger Thumbnails for galleries - global
description: If a gallery offer too small previews thus smaller than 215px.
css:
@namespace html url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://"){
[id*="humb"] img:not([src*="avatar"]),
[class*="humb"] img:not([src*="avatar"]),
[id*="hmb"] img,
[class*="hmb"] img,
img[id*="humb"],
img[class*="humb"],
img[id*="hmb"],
img[class*="hmb"],
img[src*="humb"],
img[src*="hmb"],
#video img,
.video img,
a.image img[class*="image"],
img[width][src*=".jpg"],
td>a[href*=".jpg"]>img,
a>img[onmouseout*="humb"],
a[href^="/imgs"]>img[src*="/img"],
.videoblock>.wrap,.wrap>.phimage,.nf-videos-hq .img,
[onmouseover*="Rotator"]
 {height:auto !important;width:auto !important;min-height:110px !important;min-width:215px !important;}
/*---- container ----*/
div[id*="humb"]:not([class*="button"]),
div[class*="humb"]:not([class*="button"]),
a[id*="humb"],
a[class*="humb"],
div[id*="hmb"],
div[class*="hmb"],
a[id*="hmb"],
a[class*="hmb"],
div#video,
div.video,
a.image[rel],
table[border="0"] a[href*=".jpg"],
a[href*="/vid"]:not([data-submenu-type]):not(li)[p="1"],
a[href*="/mov"],
a[href*="/thumb"]:not([data-rb-tooltip]),
.vimage,
td>a[href^="/imgs"],
.img[data-related-url],
li.videoblock
 {height:auto !important;width:auto !important;min-height:113px !important;min-width:218px !important;}
span[class*="humb"],
span[class*="hmb"],
ul[class*="video"] li,
a[onmouseout*="humb"]
a[class*="humb"]>span
 {height:auto !important;width:auto !important;min-height:114px !important;min-width:219px !important;}
div[class*="humb"] p,
div[id*="humb"] p,
[class^="rv-"] .rv-video-img-container,
.rv-jq-area,
#container>div>div,
.w100 .boxL,.w100 .boxC,
.col3,
figure,table[width="900"]
 {height:auto !important;width:auto !important;}
.thumbnail-info-wrapper,
.w100 .video,
.left-sidebar>.thumbs div.thumb,.thumbplus,.divplusarea
 {height:auto !important;max-width:215px !important;}
.video
 {height:auto !important;max-height:100% !important;}
.boxC .video
{padding:inherit !important;}
notspecificed
{margin:inherit !important;}
#container-thumbs
{overflow:inherit !important;}
.divbtnplus
{position:inherit !important;}
span.hd-thumbnail
{display:none !important;}}
